ComicInfo.Title: Pee Dawg Pulls a Train; Dat Brat from Brooklyn!; The Axeman; Gold Is Whar You Find It, Chapter 9: No Man Is an Axle; Jono Emoto; The Love-Life of an Artist...; The Adventures of George "Murky" Murkoid; A Life in the Night; Imported Erotika; Gold Is Where You Find It! Chapter 12: Meteor!; Gold Is Whar You Find It, Chapter 11: Don't Mess Wif Me; Gold Is Where You Find It, Chapter 10: Fool's Gold!; Her New Family; Murder!; The Seed Is Sown!; A Trip to the Country!; A Hot Day in Brooklyn!

ComicInfo.Summary:
The life story of a Brooklyn brat
An axe murderer in 1920s Louisiana
Jono's girlfriend wants to move out
Dori breaks up her engagement and goes out with a man much younger than her.
George remembers first meeting Gloria
Dora's car breaks down
A sex movie pastiche.
